problems_validated.severity: High - affects team management and productivity
problems_validated.current_solutions: Traditional remote work tools and practices
problems_validated.market_gap: Lack of culture-building services for remote teams

business_strategies.strategy: Variant perception investing - having contrarian views of the future and building into those predictions
business_strategies.implementation: Identify contrarian views, build businesses around those predictions
business_strategies.expected_results: Get paid when proven correct about variant perception
business_strategies.case_study: Building businesses around contrarian future predictions

problems_solutions.problem: Remote team culture building and management challenges
problems_solutions.solution: Culture as a service business model

startup_ideas.idea: Culture as a service for remote companies
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Difficulty building and maintaining company culture remotely
startup_ideas.business_model: Service-based model organizing team summits and culture events
startup_ideas.validation: Growing number of remote companies needing culture solutions

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Following conventional wisdom without contrarian analysis
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Missing opportunities by following the crowd
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Develop variant perception and contrarian viewpoints
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Assuming all work will remain remote forever without considering swing back

growth_tactics.tactic: Regular team summits in different locations for remote companies

metrics_kpis.optimization_tip: Monitor for potential swing back to in-person

trends_signals.trend: Potential swing back to in-person work in tech
trends_signals.opportunity: Contrarian bet against permanent remote work assumption
Mentioned Aaron Levie and Brian Chesky calling Web3 a sham

actionable_quotes.quote: You have to have a variant perception of what the future looks like i.e like a contrarian or different perspective and then go build into that and then you're paid when you're proven correct
actionable_quotes.context: Discussion about business strategy and predictions
actionable_quotes.actionability: Develop contrarian views and build businesses around them

actionable_quotes.quote: Just because these leaders or titans of industry are saying you know this is where the world's gonna go doesn't mean it's the gospel so take everything with a grain of salt
actionable_quotes.actionability: Think independently rather than following authority figures blindly

key_statistics.statistic: 80-90% of job openings for developers are now remote
